title: Chris Simms Killing the Beasts
description:
Killing the Beasts

Manchester 2002. The Commonwealth Games are coming to town and the City is alive
with possibilities. But the pressure is getting to Tom Benwell, accountant
 manager at an advertising firm. There are too many deals to make and lies to tell.
Maenwhile his highly committed friend DI Jon Spencer is on the fast track. However
in the aftermath of the Games,a series of brutal killings shatters the citys new 
found spirit. Jon Spencer gets the case. Each victim has been murdered in the
same grotesque manner- and the lack of motive has left the polce baffled....
